plot: Paul and Hank are house buddies. On a hot summer night Hank asks Paul to whip up an orange drink that they call, 'Orange Delight'. They're not prepared for the consequences of this seemingly simple task.
title: Orange Delight
plot_es: Paul and Hank are house buddies. On a hot summer night Hank asks Paul to whip up an orange drink that they call, 'Orange Delight'. They're not prepared for the consequences of this seemingly simple task.
plot_en: Paul and Hank are house buddies. On a hot summer night Hank asks Paul to whip up an orange drink that they call, 'Orange Delight'. They're not prepared for the consequences of this seemingly simple task.
